Hammock: A lightweight and easy-to-set-up bed that can be hung between two sturdy trees or poles.
Futon: A foldable bed that can be easily stored away when not in use.
Air mattress: An inflatable bed that can be quickly set up and deflated for easy storage.
Couch: A multi-functional piece of furniture that can be easily converted into a bed.
Sleep pod: A small, enclosed sleeping space that can be found in some public spaces or airports.
